Chirinda: No effect of cropping system on the greenhouse gas N2O J.H. Ingemann: Economics, Policy, and Organic Agriculture Brief news: TP ORganics needs you!, New publication: The World of ORganic Agriculture: Statistics and emerging trends, NJF seminar, Organic farmers bite back!, International conference on organic agriculture in Scope of environmental problems, Expo - MENOPE: 7th Middle East Natural and Organic Products
